thread.section_title: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Calm oasis
thread.title_full: Calm oasis - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ahr
title: Calm oasis
text:
We have just spent three nights at Villa Saxe Eiffel and enjoyed it enormously. It is in a quiet , up market area and provided the peace we needed after a busy day out.
The bedroom was well soundproofed and we slept well. Breakfast is superb with a great choice of good quality produce. The only downside for us was that our room had no bath. Staff are only there when you need them and without exception they were charming. We shall return.
Room Tip: Some rooms have small balconies which must be nice in the summer. See more room tips
